Software Development Projects

About

I am a full-stack developer based in Valparaiso, Indiana.

Prior to my life as a developer, I was a podcast producer and music journalist.

I have a strong foundation in production management, communication, and delivering content. I am looking to work in a forward-thinking environment that prioritizes care and clean, maintainable code.

Around the Web

About Freelancer

Freelance is a free to use, MIT licensed Bootstrap theme created by Start Bootstrap .

Copyright © tim crisp 2022

Gear Hoarder

Gear Hoarder is a React Built Web App utilizing a Flask API backend. Gear Hoarder is an app for musicians who can't get enough gear. Users can add guitars, amps, and pedals to their profile, and create customized rigs from their collection.

Check out the app:


Vinyls

Vinyls is a React Built Web App utilizing a third- party API via Discogs. Vinyls takes the Discogs search engine and focuses on the UI experience around the joy of record collecting, separate from the data-driven experience of Discogs analytics. With more changes to be implimented in the near future, we hope to make Vinyls a home for the record collector desiring a unique and modern UI.

Check out the app:


Matches

Matches is a MEN-stack application built using Express, Node.js, and Mongoose. Matches users can log and rate the professional wrestling matches they watch.

Check out the deployed app:

Facts

Facts is a browser-based trivia game built with HTML, CSS, and Javascript

Check out the deployed app:
